name: Judge William H. Orrick
office: U.S. District Judge, Northern District of California
bio: Appointed by President Barack Obama. Known for rulings on immigration, civil rights, and tech-related cases.
education: Yale University (BA), Boston College Law School (JD)

keyVotes.title: City and County of San Francisco v. Trump
keyVotes.result: Blocked federal funding cuts to sanctuary cities

name: Judge Jacqueline Scott Corley
office: U.S. District Judge, Northern District of California
bio: Appointed by President Joe Biden. Former magistrate judge with a focus on antitrust and tech litigation.

keyVotes.title: FTC v. Microsoft Corp.
keyVotes.result: Denied FTC’s motion to block Microsoft’s acquisition of Activision

name: Judge Tanya S. Chutkan
office: U.S. District Judge, District of Columbia
bio: Appointed by President Barack Obama. Presided over high-profile January 6 and election-related cases.
education: George Washington University (BA), University of Pennsylvania Law School (JD)

keyVotes.title: United States v. Donald J. Trump (2023)
keyVotes.result: Issued pretrial orders in federal election interference case
